headline: Will Ending BVNK Talks and Launching UK Crypto Accounts Shift Coinbase Global's (COIN) Investment Narrative?
summary: Coinbase Global, Inc. confirmed it has ended acquisition talks with stablecoin startup BVNK, halting a planned US$2 billion deal that had reached the due diligence stage, while also announcing the launch of a UK interest-bearing crypto savings account backed by ClearBank. The move highlights Coinbase’s continued push into traditional financial services and stablecoins, signaling a deepening integration between crypto exchanges and conventional banking infrastructure. We’ll examine how...

headline: Goldman Sachs Lowers Coinbase (COIN) PT to $314 as Crypto Stocks See Recent Decline
summary: Coinbase Global Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN) is one of the most profitable large cap stocks to buy right now. On November 21, Goldman Sachs lowered the firm’s price target on Coinbase to $314 from $368 with a Neutral rating on the shares. According to the firm, shares of brokers and crypto-related stocks have collectively fallen by ~15% […]

headline: Coinbase downgraded on high valuation as earnings outpace peers
summary: Investing.com -- Argus cut its rating on Coinbase to Hold from Buy, saying the crypto exchange’s valuation has moved too far ahead of traditional exchange operators even as earnings continue to improve.

content.title: Coinbase downgraded on high valuation as earnings outpace peers
content.summary: Investing.com -- Argus cut its rating on Coinbase to Hold from Buy, saying the crypto exchange’s valuation has moved too far ahead of traditional exchange operators even as earnings continue to improve.

headline: Kraken launches Mastercard for UK, European users as neobank race heats up
summary: The Mastercard debit card offers 1% cashback in fiat or Bitcoin. Kraken’s launch is the latest battlefront among emerging neobanks. The exchange’s Krak app unveiled new Vaults that yield up to 10%.

content.title: Kraken launches Mastercard for UK, European users as neobank race heats up
content.summary: The Mastercard debit card offers 1% cashback in fiat or Bitcoin. Kraken’s launch is the latest battlefront among emerging neobanks. The exchange’s Krak app unveiled new Vaults that yield up to 10%.

thumbnail.caption: Kraken is positioning itself as a neobank competitor with the latest rollout. Illustration: Gwen P; Source: Kraken

headline: The Stock Market Is Struggling. Blame Nvidia, Crypto Stocks.
summary: The S&P 500 struggled at the open on Tuesday, but the majority of stocks in the index were rising.  With the market benchmark down 0.6%, more than 350 stocks in the index were set to close higher.  The Invesco S&P 500 Equal Weight ETF, which weighs every stock in the index the same, was up 0.2%.

content.title: The Stock Market Is Struggling. Blame Nvidia, Crypto Stocks.
content.summary: The S&P 500 struggled at the open on Tuesday, but the majority of stocks in the index were rising.  With the market benchmark down 0.6%, more than 350 stocks in the index were set to close higher.  The Invesco S&P 500 Equal Weight ETF, which weighs every stock in the index the same, was up 0.2%.

headline: Nvidia & AMD stocks fall on Meta news, Kohl's stock skyrockets
summary: Yahoo Finance anchor Julie Hyman takes a closer look at some of the top market stories of Tuesday's trading day on this Market Minute. Nvidia (NVDA) and AMD (AMD) stocks are falling following reports from The Information that Meta (META) will use Alphabet's (GOOG, GOOGL) Google AI chips. Crypto stocks like Coinbase (COIN), Strategy (MSTR), and Bullish (BLSH) are under pressure amid the wider bitcoin (BTC-USD) sell-off. Kohl's (KSS) stock is skyrocketing after the company reported a surprise third quarter profit and outlook boost. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

content.title: Nvidia & AMD stocks fall on Meta news, Kohl's stock skyrockets
content.description:
Yahoo Finance anchor Julie Hyman takes a closer look at some of the top market stories of Tuesday's trading day on this Market Minute.

Nvidia (NVDA) and AMD (AMD) stocks are falling following reports from The Information that Meta (META) will use Alphabet's (GOOG, GOOGL) Google AI chips.

Crypto stocks like Coinbase (COIN), Strategy (MSTR), and Bullish (BLSH) are under pressure amid the wider bitcoin (BTC-USD) sell-off.

Kohl's (KSS) stock is skyrocketing after the company reported a surprise third quarter profit and outlook boost.

Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

Nvidia (NVDA) and AMD (AMD) stocks are falling following reports from The Information that Meta (META) will use Alphabet's (GOOG, GOOGL) Google AI chips. Crypto stocks like Coinbase (COIN), Strategy (MSTR), and Bullish (BLSH) are under pressure amid the wider bitcoin (BTC-USD) sell-off. Kohl's (KSS) stock is skyrocketing after the company reported a surprise third quarter profit and outlook boost. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Pretty Much Everything is Rallying—Just Not Nvidia
summary: The stock market’s “everything rally” picked back up, but Nvidia and other AI names were notable exceptions.  The S&P 500 was up 0.5% after trading sideways earlier in the morning.  The Dow was up 483 points, or 1%.

headline: Choppy Waters On Low Volume For BTC
summary: With Thanksgiving fast approaching in the US, volume across all markets is starting to dwindle as traders, investors, and various market participants start to travel for the holidays.
